name: Leap of Faith (itch) (Dangermau5)
description:
Fullscreen Recommended.

Plant seeds to help Bird reach his goal! Leap of Faith is a relaxing platformer with light physics-based puzzle solving and silhouette-style vector graphics.

This short game was made part-time as part of a 2-week rapid ideation session as part of my MA in Indie Game Development. The theme for the session was a dixit card of a crow priest, crossed with a news article (mine had to to with planting trees). I also made use of a diversifier In Ink, which meant all graphics had to be in absolute black and white; no colours, no grayscale.

If you're interested in reading about this game's development, I have captured my process on my critical reflective journal.
